programmes.show_description: Bloodshed follows in the wake of Douglas Clark and Carol Bundy, better known as the Sunset Strip Killers, as they spread violence across Los Angeles.

The village is horrified when a sniper appears to be on the loose, and Bellamy has a near miss with a bullet. DI Shiner makes Mike an offer that's hard to refuse.
PC Crane and Dr Merrick worry about the welfare of an elderly farmer's widow. David helps Blaketon front a protest against a local quarry.
Nostalgic police drama series set in a 1960s Yorkshire village. Villagers are curious when a mystery woman comes to live with Steve Crane.
An English squire is terrorised by an unknown person who begins sending letters warning that he will kidnap his son, but Poirot is on the case.
While dining with his dentist, Poirot notices a fellow diner has drastically changed his diet and a dying man's brother suffers a tragic end.
A detective interviews Betsy about her discovery of a dead body, but which of five potential victims will be murdered and who is their killer?

Kevin and Ronnie challenge Debbie over Carls claim that hes her son, Megan and Will discuss their Sam problem, and Hope tries to worm her way into Ritas good books.

Sam checks his phone for evidence of Megan and Wills affair, Debbie vows to make amends to Carl, and Jodie stirs up trouble at The Kabin.
Paul O'Grady meets a Staffie cross full of energy that needs help to calm down in kennels, a rare West African dog called an Azawakh and an overbred bulldog.
As Inspector Endeavour searches for a missing Danish nanny, he spends time in the Oxfordshire countryside, city parks, and the world of scientific academia.
Alex explores the mountainous region of Le Marche and reconnects with a former boyfriend who shows her the back streets of Rome.

The first helping of this epic adventure runs from Chicago to St Louis. The Bikers discover hickory smoked BBQ meat and a rather soggy Italian beef sub roll.
A woman's dying wish was to reunite her younger brother with his birth family, and her daughter attempts to fulfil the promise.
DI Ray focuses once again on the Chapman family; DI Ray and Clive carry out a plan to discover the corruption present in the highest ranks of the department.
Beth tries to protect her family as the rumour mill in town goes wild; more victims are linked to Tom and Beth is terrified she may have married a murderer.
Members of Chicago Firehouse 51 put aside differences and drama to save lives.
Demelza refuses to speak to Ross; George tries to talk Elizabeth out of cancelling their wedding; Ross' good luck may be improving with the prospect of a partnership.
Judge Rinder focuses on the deaths of six children in a house fire, and the murder of 67-year-old Rita Stephens in Penoced, Bridgend, for which police arrested her son Mark.

Miller is delighted when his old army pal arrives in town. Jack is jealous of the help and support Gina gives Bellamy.
Cassie hosts a handsome stranger named Henry along with Olivia, a visiting poet that she encounters; as the two begin to connect, a revelation threatens things.
NASA's cutting-edge Orion spacecraft is the next big thing in space travel. Hear how developers hope the module will aid human exploration of Mars and of asteroids.
The designers create a summer collection for Womenswear Week, but only designs that impress the judges and customers will be successful.
Jeremy Wade visits South America for a predator believed to be more fearsome than a piranha. Tipped off about an attack on a diver, he knows there is a real monster to find.
A couple in Burnley overcoming a recent burglary gets a nice surprise from the design team.
Poirot is unhappy to be asked to investigate the disappearance of a cook, but soon discovers the case may be worthy of his talents.
Brian Dowling and his design team are on a mission to prove that you can achieve the home renovation of your dreams without it literally costing the earth.
A former model and her husband run a luxury B&B and spa, but they are struggling due to falling guest numbers and the recession.
Marlon is furious. Paddy is determined to help his dad. Kammy and Ross match-make.

Nostalgic drama spin-off set in a hospital. Mr Rose's skills are put to the test in the field. Ken and Alun turn detective after a disastrous stag night.
Drama series about a Cornish detective. When a fishing boat sinks, killing one of the crew, Kersey and Lane discover a community struggling to keep its head above water.
Detective drama series. When a psychiatrist's wife is murdered in a frenzied attack, Wycliffe finds that proving a motive is harder than catching the killer.
Nostalgic police drama. A domestic dispute rages out of control, and Peggy's hold over David is threatened by a new arrival exerting her feminine wiles.
Demelza is beaten for trespassing when she defies George's power, which incites an angry mob; Elizabeth fears that George is not the father of her baby.
